description: /b/Exposure/b/ adds /b/cameras/b/ and /b/photographs/b/. Place some /b/Film/b/ into a camera, /6/click to take a picture/6/, and /6/develop the film/6/ then /6/print/6/ in a /b/Lightbox/b/.

Black and white film is much cheaper than coloured film. /b/Lenses/b/ can be /6/fitted/6/ to the front of the camera. A /b/Spyglass/b/ /6/increases zoom./6/ A /b/Redstone Lantern/b/ adds a /6/flash/6/.

If you have an image from outside of this world, an /b/Interplaner Projector/b/ can be /6/renamed to a file adress/6/. /6/Attach it to a camera and take a picture/6/, if all went well the film should have captured that image.
